rules_text:
Flying, prowess
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, [b][look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard][/b]
Flash paradigm {1}{B}, pay 2 life. [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
